alert.note: Alert for Brown; Outagamie; Shawano; Southern Oconto County; Waupaca; Waushara; Winnebago (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 1:52AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Brown, northwestern Winnebago, Waushara, southeastern Waupaca, southern Oconto, Outagamie and eastern Shawano Counties through 230 AM CDT... At 151 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Shawano to 9 miles northwest of New London to 6 miles west of Wautoma. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 45 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... New London around 210 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Pulaski, Redgranite and Black Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until these storms pass.

area.areaDesc: Brown; Outagamie; Shawano; Southern Oconto County; Waupaca; Waushara; Winnebago
